author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter KERDI-BOARD tip…I use the shower valve plug to put a hole in the board. Then I center the mixing valve seal and trace a circle. I cut that circle 1/8” wider and that helps the valve seal fit tight. Many thanks to @schlutersystemsna for partnering with me on this tutorial and making great shower waterproofing products 🔥🍊#schlutersystems #showerrenovation #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter KERDI-BOARD Tip - #shorts #homerepairtutor #schlutersystems #brandpartner
